snippet: In the wake of several deaths related to Ecstasy, the Mad Decent Block Party this weekend will prohibit masks, pacifiers, dolls, eyedroppers, spray paint, unsealed tampons and other items.
abstract: Organizers of Mad Decent Block Party, outdoor electronic dance music concert scheduled at Brooklyn's MCU Park, announce unusual set of safety measures; enhanced precautions, which include long list of prohibited items, were made after series of drug-related deaths at concerts across the country and Canada.
lead_paragraph: In the wake of several deaths related to Ecstasy, the Mad Decent Block Party this weekend will prohibit masks, pacifiers, dolls, eyedroppers, spray paint, unsealed tampons and other items.

headline.main: To Curb Drug Use, an Electronic Music Concert in Brooklyn Restricts What Guests Can Bring
headline.print_headline: After Deaths, More Items Prohibited at a Concert
